author: courant.com
title: High School Football: Granby Beats Lewis Mills
text:
Caption Granby Beats Lewis Mills Brad Horrigan / Brad Horrigan Granby, CT - 10/03/15 - Granby's Gage Fiorentino sacks Lewis Mills quarterback Trevor Baker Saturday at Granby High School. Granby won the game 52-6. Photo by BRAD HORRIGAN | bhorrigan@courant.com Granby, CT - 10/03/15 - Granby's Gage Fiorentino sacks Lewis Mills quarterback Trevor Baker Saturday at Granby High School. Granby won the game 52-6. Photo by BRAD HORRIGAN | bhorrigan@courant.com (Brad Horrigan / Brad Horrigan) See more galleries Caption Granby Beats Lewis Mills Brad Horrigan / Brad Horrigan Granby, CT - 10/03/15 - Lewis Mills' Ian Dunn, left, tries to strip the ball from Granby's Logan Strain Saturday. Granby won the game 52-6. Photo by BRAD HORRIGAN | bhorrigan@courant.com Granby, CT - 10/03/15 - Lewis Mills' Ian Dunn, left, tries to strip the ball from Granby's Logan Strain Saturday. Granby won the game 52-6. Photo by BRAD HORRIGAN | bhorrigan@courant.com (Brad Horrigan / Brad Horrigan) See more galleries Granby buried Lewis Mills 52-6 at home Saturday afternoon.
Brad Horrigan This photo gallery is featured in these articles: High School Sports High School Football: Hartford Public Gets First Win
